Trial_Design.evidence: The rats were randomly divided into three groups, with seven rats assigned to each group

Method_Outcome.evidence: Perfusion imaging was conducted on PODs 7 and 14 and compared to pre-operative perfusion imaging

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: The rats were randomly divided into three groups

Number_Randomised.evidence: The rats were randomly divided into three groups, with seven rats assigned to each group

Result_Outcome.evidence: Group 3 showed a significant increase in perfusion, high CD31-positive capillary lumen density, and substantial overexpression of VEGF
